title: its time to make the IFS also check post and pre game chat.
body:
this chat used to be SOMEWHAT nice. somewhat.
now its literally used for ppl to say stuff like %%% kys and other shit.
why?
because this chat is only moderated if a human review triggers.

"no its not" yes it is.
after realizing it i tried it myself.

made a new acc
duo games vs bots with a friend
told him to report me
spammed kys in pre and post game chat
did this for 20 games.

the acc is still unbanned.

replies.body: It already does. They have checked it for a while now, if you mentioned it in the comments, but now they are including it in chat logs with headings for the different sections.

really? since when?
we tested this 4 month ago or so.

so if i report someone who never wrote anything besides kys in champ select or after the game, will the IFS ban them without human review?

I started seeing people come to the boards with pre/post game chat in their logs about a couple weeks ago.

Edit:
Yep, found where Tantram was saying that the changes went live;

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=akoU6f6G,comment-id=0001000100020001000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-17T19:33:57.689+0000)
>
> They are. It is live in NA right now, and will follow to more regions soon(tm).

It was changed more recently than that, last month or two. For a short time before that it punished for it but couldn't show logs, now it both punishes and shows the logs. Idk if it only shows them when relevant or not though.

Yes it does it without human review.

Just so there is no confusion. This was taken from the 8.11 patch notes:

> Reform cards are getting some spring cleaning, so we added per-game tabs for chat logs, and made it more clear which chat is from **pre-, mid-, or post-game**. 

Bolded the answer to your question. Thank you and good night.
